title: Why am i getting troll banned
body:
I just got a 10 game chat restriction after a game in which a player <Removed by Moderation> troll banned my first pick and took my other champion which didn't fit his role (keep in mind I'm low level and only had so many champion options), and another player actually literally ran it down and said in chat that he was was inting, both on my team. My question how i got chat restricted yet haven't received a notice saying a recent report has been blah blah blah? And why riot keeps this players choose toxic behavior when it seems abused in my opinion.
Here's my chat log:
Game 1
Pre-Game
Homiedude69: id actually love it if you played poppy
Homiedude69: this bot lane is gonna troll so id say dodge
Homiedude69: 2 queues in a row shes banned my champs
Homiedude69: or taken

Homiedude69: not to play it
Homiedude69: shut up loser
In-Game

Homiedude69: u are muted
Homiedude69: i told you shes gonna troll
Homiedude69: you didnt listen
Homiedude69: report this lux
Homiedude69: ur actually stilll try harding bot lane
Homiedude69: lul
Homiedude69: omegalul
Homiedude69: not me
Homiedude69: lux banned and took my picks
Homiedude69: thats all i had left
Homiedude69: ^

Homiedude69: we still can

Homiedude69: lmo
Homiedude69: lmlao ur fizz bud
Homiedude69: you cant even fight this game without ur team fizz you definitely cant 1v1
Homiedude69: 3v1
Homiedude69: 1v1 mme rn
Homiedude69: thats all you get to show ur skill
Homiedude69: if you dont
Homiedude69: then ur scaree
Homiedude69: scared
Homiedude69: there e go ur the bad one lol
Homiedude69: one more chance to accept a 1v1 before i mute you
Homiedude69: there we have it youre scare
Homiedude69: gg
Homiedude69: ez
Post-Game
Homiedude69: k
Homiedude69: pls
Homiedude69: report lux and camille

Homiedude69: i didnt do anything wrong

Homiedude69: how can you say that when we 4v5d
Homiedude69: get off your high horse
Homiedude69: lux f you mate
Homiedude69: youre getting reported
Homiedude69: forsure

replies.body:
{{champion:267}} Hey there.

I removed the name of the player you mentioned in this post as it violates our Universal Rules about Naming and Shaming.

"No personal attacks or witch-hunting, for any reason. Do not make posts accusing another player of causing a negative in-game experience, cheating, trolling, or any other malicious activity, even if you have hard evidence.

If you see or hear about another person breaking the rules in-game, send a ticket to Player Support."

If you have any questions about this moderation action, don't hesitate to reach out to the Boards Moderation Team via:

* The [**NA Boards Discord**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/7rtKBZLi-boards-moderation-discord-verification)
* The [**Discuss the Boards**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation) sub-board
right sorry, just wanted to make it clear he had toxic in his name

> [{quoted}](name=Homiedude69,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=pWBa4gRA,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2018-08-01T04:27:55.385+0000)
>
> right sorry, just wanted to make it clear he had toxic in his name

{{champion:267}} Not a problem, now you know for next time :)

Your pregame chat is already bad.

Your first lines of chat in game are nwgative and such.

Could u not mute all and.play?

Hope lesson serves the.purpose

Right, so maybe you could tell me where i actually went wrong as I still don't see harmful reportable language here. The guy said he wasn't a girl he was gender neutral to which i said "shut up loser" after he did indeed ban and take my champs.(if you think the word loser is bad grow up) Seems like my pre-game chat is meaningless so far to me.
First few lines are just talking to my teammates as they haven't yet discovered we're actuallly being trolled. 
And i did mute my teammates, but enemy banter is still fun.
[EDITED BY MODERATION - ULANOPO]

If u really cant,see

Negative by telling teammates,are,going to troll, suggesting dodge

Plus "shut up loser"

Negative behaviour.

In game.chat

Report calling spaming nwgative.

But I actually knew he was going to troll because his name had the word toxic in it, and he was in the queue before and trolled. I didn't just say dodge, I actually didn't want to play with this person, and thought I was saving us all from a horrific game. 

Also could anyone give me a short list of non-profanity that I'm also not allowed to use as i thought loser would be ok? Or is it the shut up part? I graduated elementary school a long time ago so this doesn't make sense to me.

And telling enemy fizz to 1v1 me is toxic? i thought it would be fun seeing as we were already gonna lose with a jg running it down every lane.

I will concede that saying pls report is overbearing but how else do i get people reported? seeing as if the troll is on the enemy team, a free win may be nice and may make you not want to report as is proof in my games. And i can't single-handedly get toxic players banned.

I'm genuinely asking all of these questions and am actually trying to not get another report so please help.

U have to not offend anyone in any way in any circumstances even if in rl u qould be allowed to (riot removed a post in which i stated someone was "ineducated"). So avoid it.

Your single report  works . U dont need to ask for more reports because they dont add anything. Moreover if u spam that indont chat u areare punishable.

Mute
Play your game
Report endgame.

Stop

reports can stack up and you'll eventually get punished if you had too many reports stacked against you. With that said you did verbally harass your teammates even though you were the victim. Riot encourages people to just mute and report. They don't want you to retaliate but if you do, they don't want you to repeatedly say "report (insert name)" a bunch of times or say " f you kid" and etc. In your case though, I can see why you're angry and I think that you shouldn't be punished. Send a ticket and see what support thinks. Their zero policy rule can be absurd sometimes
Right makes sense, which part is harassment though? So i can stop being restricted for this so-called "harassment".
